title.description: The title or name of the product.

description.description: A detailed description of the product (can be null).

link.description: The URL link to the product page on the website.

image_link.description: The URL link to the product image.

price.description: The price of the product as a string.

category.description: An array of categories that the product belongs to.

name: Product
description: Schema for a product item with details such as ID, title, description, link, image link, price, and categories.
